attributes.action: Review care allowance before the next general election
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is talk of the goverment reviewing care allowance, but decisions wont be made before 2018, this is unacceptable.  People are caring for family members, not being paid, saving the goverment millions of pounds a year and this subject is not being taken seriously by the goverment.  We want a review and decision made before the next general election.
